content:
path /v3/offchain/withdrawal
operationid getwithdrawals
parameters
description currency of the withdrawal
in query
name currency
schema
minlength 2
maxlength 30
type string
description status of the withdrawal
in query
name status
schema
type string
description max number of items per page is 50
in query
name pagesize
schema
type number
maximum 50
minimum 1
required true
description offset to obtain next page of the data
in query
name offset
schema
type number
summary get withdrawals
description 1 credit per api callget withdrawals
responses
200
schema
withdrawalobject
properties
id
description id of the withdrawal
type string
txid
description transaction id of broadcast transaction
type string
accountid
description sender account id
type string
status
description status of the withdrawal
type string
address
description blockchain address to send assets to for btc ltc doge and bch it is possible to enter list of multiple recipient blockchain addresses as a comma separated string
maxlength 10000
minlength 1
type string
reference
description transaction internal reference  unique identifier within tatum ledger in order of failure use this value to search for problems
type string
amount
description amount to be withdrawn to blockchain
maxlength 38
type string
pattern ddd
attr
description used to parametrize withdrawal used for xrp withdrawal to define destination tag of recipient or xlm memo of the recipient if needed
for bitcoin litecoin bitcoin cash used as a change address for left coins from transaction
maxlength 64
minlength 1
type string
fee
description fee to be submitted as a transaction fee to blockchain
type string
pattern ddd
multipleamounts
description for btc ltc doge and bch it is possible to enter list of multiple recipient blockchain amounts list of recipient addresses must be present in the address field and total sum of amounts must be equal to the amount field
type array
items
type string
pattern ddd
paymentid
description identifier of the payment shown for created transaction within tatum sender account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
sendernote
description note visible to owner of withdrawing account
maxlength 500
minlength 1
type string
required
amount
id
accountid
address
reference
fee
type object
type array
description ok
title: 47_Withdrawal_GetWithdrawals_427.json
